options.content: AIR QUALITY - PARTICULATE MATTER

Good
Fair
Moderate
Poor
Very poor
Extremely poor

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time_index,'1h'),
  avg(pm1) as "PM1"
FROM
   ${table:raw} 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_index) and entity_id = '$device_selected'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time_index,'1h'),
  avg(pm25) as "PM2.5"
FROM
   ${table:raw}
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_index) and entity_id = '$device_selected'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time_index,'1h'),
  avg(pm10) as "PM10"
FROM
   ${table:raw}
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_index) and entity_id = '$device_selected'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time_index,'1h'),
  avg(pm1) as "PM1 hourly average"
FROM
   ${table:raw} 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_index) and entity_id = '$device_selected'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time_index,'1h'),
  max(pm1) as "PM1 hourly max"
FROM
   ${table:raw} 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_index) and entity_id = '$device_selected'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time_index,'1d'),
  avg(pm1) as "PM1 daily average"
FROM
   ${table:raw} 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_index) and entity_id = '$device_selected'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time_index,'1h'),
  avg(pm25) as "PM2.5 hourly average"
FROM
   ${table:raw} 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_index) and entity_id = '$device_selected'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time_index,'1h'),
  max(pm25) as "PM2.5 hourly max"
FROM
   ${table:raw} 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_index) and entity_id = '$device_selected'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time_index,'1d'),
  avg(pm25) as "PM2.5 daily average"
FROM
   ${table:raw} 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_index) and entity_id = '$device_selected'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time_index,'1h'),
  avg(pm10) as "PM10 hourly average"
FROM
   ${table:raw} 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_index) and entity_id = '$device_selected'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time_index,'1h'),
  max(pm10) as "PM10 hourly max"
FROM
   ${table:raw} 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_index) and entity_id = '$device_selected'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time_index,'1d'),
  avg(pm10) as "PM10 daily average"
FROM
   ${table:raw} 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_index) and entity_id = '$device_selected'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time_index,'1h'),
  avg(pm1) as "PM1 hourly average",
  avg(pm25) as "PM2.5 hourly average",
  avg(pm10) as "PM10 hourly average"
FROM
   ${table:raw} 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_index) and entity_id = '$device_selected'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC
